name: extensions-compliance
description: Guidance for Microsoft.Extensions.Compliance data classification and redaction. USE FOR: classifying sensitive data (PII, EUII, financial), redacting log output, enforcing data handling policies, compliance-aware telemetry, audit-safe logging pipelines. DO NOT USE FOR: encryption at rest (use Data Protection APIs), access control/authorization (use ASP.NET Identity), GDPR consent management, full DLP solutions.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick

references.title: Data Redaction in .NET Documentation on Microsoft Learn
